import React from 'react' export default function Cartcomponent(props) { async function deleteItem(item_obj) { const token = localStorage.getItem('authtoken') let d = await fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND}/api/deleteFromCart`, { method: 'post', body: JSON.stringify({ props: item_obj, token }), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) d = await d.json() console.log(d) alert(d.message) setToggle(!toggle) } return (

{props.title}

Size: M Color: Grey

{props.price} Rs
{/* */}
) }
